WHERE SCREENING = 'W'
WHERE SCREENING = 'P'
WHERE SCREENING = 'C'
WHERE SCREENING = 'D'
WHERE I.MOVIE_IMG_ROLE = '광고'

SELECT M.MOVIE_NO, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.SCREENING, M.RELEASE_DATE, I.MOVIE_IMG_ROLE FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE = '광고' ) I ON (M.MOVIE_NO = I.MOVIE_NO)
WHERE SCREENING = 'W'
WHERE SCREENING = 'P'
WHERE SCREENING = 'C'
WHERE SCREENING = 'D'
